overview: From 2025-08-01 to 2025-08-02, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topIssues.title: deploy mempool rebroadcaster cronjob
topIssues.author: yashvardhan-kukreja
topIssues.body:
Though we haven't encountered this yet, Base informed us of their experiences with noticing some transactions getting rejected by the mempool of rbuilder while being accepted by geth.

This created mempool drifts cascading in the form halted transaction inclusion for some of the unlucky transactions.

To workaround this, they built a mempool rebroadcaster which runs as a CronJob and re-inserts the rejected transactions to the rejecting mempool by performing periodic checks.

We should deploy it as a preventive measure.

Here's the link to it - https://github.com/base/infra

topPRs.title: dependabot(gomod): bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.14.0 to 0.16.0
topPRs.author: dependabot
topPRs.body:
Bumps [golang.org/x/sync](https://github.com/golang/sync) from 0.14.0 to 0.16.0.
Commits
  • 7fad2c9 errgroup: revert propagation of panics
  • 8a14946 errgroup: remove duplicated comment
  • 1869c69 all: replace deprecated ioutil
  • d1ac909 sync/errgroup: PanicError.Error print stack trace
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=golang.org/x/sync&package-manager=go_modules&previous-version=0.14.0&new-version=0.16.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

topContributors.summary: HiteshMittal07: Focused on expanding the Superchain Registry by merging PR #1092, which added the Arena Z Testnet, demonstrating a primary focus on configuration and documentation related to tests.

cuiweixie: Focused on an internal code improvement, opening PR ethereum-optimism/optimism#16937 to update `op-node` to use `math/rand/v2`, which involved a small code change of 3 lines added and 3 lines deleted.
Wazabie: Focused on bugfix work and other tasks, opening one PR, ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops#1157 "Fix set respected game template", and modifying 93 files with 3 commits primarily in tests.
yashvardhan-kukreja: Focused on infrastructure improvements, specifically by creating an issue to deploy a mempool rebroadcaster cronjob in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16932).
